title: Riot please
body: Riot it's been almost 2 days and i've yet to hear back about the support ticket I made does it usually take this long? :/

replies.body:
I looked at your ticket and it doesn't look like it's been quite as long as you mentioned, but the holidays result in a lot more tickets being sent to us. A specialist will reach back out in your ticket as soon as possible, just give it a bit longer. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
It feels like 2 days q.q I just want to transfer my name from one account to another I can do that right?
